ygData.subject: Re: Extremely P.O.'d
ygData.msgSnippet: It will be interesting to see if Verant takes any action.  Considering their policy opposed to E-bay - but the issue that E-bay is too big and complicated to
ygData.messageBody:
It will be interesting to see if Verant takes any action. Considering their
policy opposed to E-bay - but the issue that E-bay is too big and
complicated to police - and the level of anonymity etc. These people are
easy to find and would be trivial for them to police.

If I was the EQ Product Producer - and I was sincere in this policy - I'd at
the very least have my legal department (I'm sure Sony at least has no
shortage of these on staff!) send a cease-and-desist order!

Slide

----- Original Message -----
From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 25, 2000 11:26 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Extremely P.O.'d


> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> That is kind of funny, isn't it?
>
> But my point is being solicited for items not even on their page
>
>
>
